summary: An unhappy middle-aged banker agrees to a procedure that will fake his death and give him a completely new look and identity - one that comes with its own price.
cast: Frank Campanella|John Randolph|Frances Reid|Barbara Werle|Edgar Stehli|Aaron Magidow|Dee Dee Young|Françoise Ruggieri|Murray Hamilton|Thom Conroy|Jeff Corey|Will Geer|Richard Anderson|Rock Hudson|Khigh Dhiegh|John D. title: Plan diabólico
